title: Fix meditation page slider behavior, restore back button, and match button dimensions

requirements.summary: Fix the time control slider in the meditation page so dragging right increases time and dragging left decreases it
acceptanceCriteria: Dragging the slider handle to the right increases the displayed time value
Dragging the slider handle to the left decreases the displayed time value
The slider behaves consistently with standard slider controls

file_operations.description: Investigate and fix the reversed slider behavior where dragging right currently decreases the value instead of increasing it. Check the value prop, min/max configuration, CSS transforms, or event handler logic that may be inverting the slider direction. Ensure the slider's visual position matches the numeric value correctly.

requirements.summary: Restore the back button in the meditation page to match the pre-meditation page positioning and styling
acceptanceCriteria: Back button is visible in the meditation page
Back button appears in the same position as in the pre-meditation page
Back button styling matches the pre-meditation page back button
Back button functions correctly to navigate back

file_operations.description: Locate the meditation timer/active meditation UI section within PreMeditationPage (or identify the correct meditation page component if separate). Add the MobileBackButton component in the same position and with the same styling as it appears in the pre-meditation setup section. Ensure the back button is rendered during the active meditation state and positioned consistently.

requirements.summary: Make the 'Begin Meditation' button match the exact height and width of the 'Save Ritual' button in the pre-meditation page
acceptanceCriteria: 'Begin Meditation' button has the same height as the 'Save Ritual' button
'Begin Meditation' button has the same width as the 'Save Ritual' button
No other changes are made to the pre-meditation page

file_operations.description: Locate the 'Begin Meditation' button and 'Save Ritual' button in the PreMeditationPage component. Update the 'Begin Meditation' button's className or inline styles to match the exact height and width dimensions of the 'Save Ritual' button. Ensure both buttons use identical dimension-related CSS classes or styles without modifying any other aspects of the page layout.
